days.narrative: Get ready for a day of culinary delights and magical entertainment! Day 1 kicks off with a tasting tour of highly-rated foodie gems like Mad 4 Madeleines, Gaufre it!, Latitude 15 Pop-Up, and Boochmania, before culminating in an enchanting evening at the San Francisco Magic Theater At The Marrakech.  Prepare to be amazed!

days.narrative: Get ready for a delicious Day 2 fueled by San Francisco's finest foodie finds!  From the perfect wontons at Aya to the decadent madeleines at Mad 4 Madeleines, and with Milkman, Meryienda, and Pastoral Plate rounding out the culinary adventure, this day promises a symphony of flavors and top-notch treats.

days.narrative: Day 3 is all about fueling up with the best of Jakarta's coffee scene.  We'll hop between highly-rated cafes like Golden Goat, Kopiku, and Home Coffee Roasters, savoring the rich aromas and unique brews each spot has to offer. Prepare for a caffeine-fueled adventure!

days.narrative: Day 4 is a decadent dive into San Francisco's sweetest spots! Prepare for a sugar rush as you explore top-rated creameries like Garden Creamery, Philmore Creamery, and Milkbomb Ice Cream, indulging in innovative flavors and textures. Don't miss other delightful dessert havens like Butter & Crumble and Holy Nata to round out your sugary adventure.
